value:
Can you summon some more taguel
with that divine weapon? We could
stop worrying about extinction!$k$pWhat? You can't control who you
summon? Well...that's too bad.

I don't want to die. I'm sure that's how
everybody feels... Including the folks
who died in that terrible future.$k$pThat's why I'm fighting to save them.

You always look so busy. Why don't
you take a break and pet my fur? I
hear that it's pretty relaxing.

I'm not big on danger, but I don't want
to see you go extinct, either. On the
battlefield, you stay behind me, OK?

There are so many different Heroes
here... It's fascinating!$k$pI wonder if anybody else can turn into
an animal! Maybe a fox, a cat, a
wolf... Even a bird!

Agh! Don't do that! You scared me.
Once I greet you, I'll be on my way!
Hello, $Nu!

The future of the taguel is lookin'
bright!

Getting stronger is great, and it
makes me worry a little less.

Ack! If I don't pick up the pace,
I'm extinct!

Hey! You're helping me get
stronger. Take that, extinction!

I'm Yarne, Panne's son. If I die, the
taguel go extinct, so...keep me
somewhere safe, please!

Hey, $Nu...$k$pDid you notice? I didn't jump when
you spoke to me. I heard you coming.$k$pLately, I catch myself listening for your
footsteps, wondering where you're
going...$k$pIf you ended up getting attacked,
summoners would go extinct! And I'd
be pretty lonely.$k$pIf you're ever in danger, shout my
name, or just make a loud noise. I'll
hear it and come running!$k$pThanks to you, I've gotten plenty
strong. Now I can protect you! Thanks
for giving me the courage to help.
せやっ！
でりゃあ！
うひゃっ！
Cut it out!
Don't mess with a bunny!
No, YOU go extinct!
And stay down!
I won't give up!
So, extinction it is...
Heehee
I'm the last of my people.
Don't sneak up on me! If I die of shock, the taguel go exinct, OK?
Aah! Don't shout! You're stripping precious years off my life!
One... two... I'm doing the "Anti-Extinction Exercise Program." Want to join me?
There aren't many summoners, are there? OK. I'll watch out for you.
Mother and Father can't fight anymore, so I have to. I have to!
Being summoned to a new world was terrifying. But I'll work hard to live up to your expectations of a Hero. Keep your eyes on me.
Ready!
Don't let me die!
Not scared.
